sen.j: 栗原 仙之助（くりはら せんのすけ、弘化4年（1847年） - 明治2年5月11日 (旧暦)（1869年6月20日））は、幕末期の唐津藩士。
sen.e: Sennosuke Kurihara (1847 - June 20, 1869) was a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan.
Sennosuke KURIHARA (1847 - June 20, 1869) was a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan.
sen.cmt: Kurihara を大文字に変更しました。
sen.e: Sennosuke KURIHARA (1847 - June 20, 1869) was a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan.
Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
sen.cmt: joined の前のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).

sen.j: 戊辰戦争で上野戦争に敗戦後、北白川宮能久親王を護衛して会津藩へ向かう。
sen.e: After losing the Battle of Ueno in the Boshin War, he guarded Imperial Prince Kitashirakawanomiya Yoshihisa to Aizu Domain.
After losing the Battle of Ueno in the Boshin War, he guarded Imperial Prince Kitashirakawanomiya Yoshihisa to Aizu Domain.
After losing the Battle of Ueno in the Boshin War, he guarded Imperial Prince Kitashirakawanomiya Yoshihisa to Aizu Domain.

sen.j: 各地を転戦した後、仙台で榎本武揚艦隊らと合流。
sen.e: After fighting in various places, he joined Takeaki ENOMOTO fleet in Sendai.
After fighting in various places, he joined Takeaki ENOMOTO fleet in Sendai.
After fighting in various places, he joined Takeaki ENOMOTO fleet in Sendai.

sen.j: 蝦夷地渡航に際して、土方歳三配下の新選組に入隊した。
sen.e: When he went to Ezo, he joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA.
When he went to Ezo, he joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA.
When he went to Ezo, he joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA.

sen.j: 箱館戦争に参戦し、新政府軍による箱館総攻撃で戦死。
sen.e: He fought in the Hakodate War and was killed in the all-out assault of Hakodate by the New government army.
He fought in the Hakodate War and was killed in the all-out assault of Hakodate by the new government army.
sen.cmt: New を newに変更しました。
sen.e: He fought in the Hakodate War and was killed in the all-out assault of Hakodate by the new government army.
Died at 23.
Died at 23.
Died at 23.
